books.author: Kamala Harris
books.description: A memoir by a daughter of immigrants who was raised in Oakland, Calif., and became the second black woman ever elected to the United States Senate. Read by the author. 9 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE TRUTHS WE HOLD

books.author: Susan Orlean
books.description: The evolution and purpose of libraries. Read by the author. 12 hours, 9 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE LIBRARY BOOK

books.author: Michael Pollan
books.description: A personal account of how psychedelics might help the mentally ill and people dealing with everyday challenges. Read by the author. 13 hours, 34 minutes unabridged.
books.title: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR MIND

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: Technological, political and social issues in the modern era. Read by Derek Perkins. 11 hours, 41 minutes unabridged.
books.title: 21 LESSONS FOR THE 21ST CENTURY

books.description: When we can and cannot trust our intuitions in making business and personal decisions. 20 hours, 2 minutes unabridged. Read by Patrick Egan.
books.title: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW
